TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PasswordBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class PasswordBox Inherits Control
public ref class PasswordBox sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示用于输入和处理密码的控件。

span.span: Represents a control designed for entering and handling passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有内置处理的浮升和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自定义事件处理程序，侦听`MouseUp`或`MouseDown`中的事件`PasswordBox`永远不会调用。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a `PasswordBox` will never be called. 如果需要响应这些事件，隧道侦听并事件相反，或注册处理程序替换参数 （此后一种选择是仅可通过代码）。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不要将标记处理除非有意要禁用的事件本机处理这些事件，并注意这产生显著影响控件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 自定义 PasswordBox 控件Customizing the PasswordBox Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[PasswordBox 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [PasswordBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定的处理程序方法事件。The following example shows how to specify the handler method for the event. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下面的示例显示了相应的事件处理程序。The following example shows the corresponding event handler. 在这种情况下，事件处理程序只是递增计数器。In this case, the event handler simply increments a counter. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwbox_pwchanged)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwbox_pwchanged)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指定密码框插入符号颜色的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that specifies the color of the password box's caret.

value.span: 描述密码框插入符号颜色的画笔。

span.span: A brush that describes the color of the password box's caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性的指定其插入符号的颜色。You can set the property of a to specify the color of its caret. 例如，可以设置是相同的值属性。For example, you can set to be the same value as the property. 指示的颜色中的字符。 indicates the color of the characters in the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置和为红色。The following example creates a and sets the and to red. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Caretbrush 设置为红色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox 将 caretbrush 设置为红色。")![PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.](~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.") Caretbrush 设置为红色的 PasswordBoxPasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red

summary.span: 获取或设置用于处理此密码的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 一个整数，指定的最大长度，以字符为单位，密码即可处理此。

span.span: An integer specifying the maximum length, in characters, for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 值为零 (**0**) 表示没有任何限制。

span.span: A value of zero (**0**) means no limit.

value.span: 默认值是**0** （没有长度限制）。

span.span: The default value is **0** (no length limit).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于限制用户; 手动输入的密码它具有的编程操作不会影响属性。This property only restricts passwords entered manually by the user; it has no effect on programmatic manipulation of the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_maxlen)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_maxlen)]

public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Password : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前保留的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets the password currently held by the .

value.span: 一个表示当前保留的密码字符串。

span.span: A string representing the password currently held by the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当获取属性值，以在内存中的明文形式公开的密码。When you get the property value, you expose the password as plain text in memory. 若要避免此潜在的安全风险，请使用属性来获取密码作为。To avoid this potential security risk, use the property to get the password as a . 此属性设置为`null`导致基础的密码设置为。Setting this property to `null` causes the underlying password to be set to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwd)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwd)]

member this.PasswordChar : char with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置的掩码字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the masking character for the .

value.span: 用户输入文本时回显的掩码字符。

span.span: A masking character to echo when the user enters text into the .

value.span: 默认值是项目符号字符 (**●**)。

span.span: The default value is a bullet character (**●**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本输入到，密码输入的字段中，而不是实际的密码本身中回显该属性指定的掩码字符。When text is entered into a , the masking character specified by this property is echoed in the password input field, rather than the actual password itself. 这有助于防止将密码暴露给随意观察程序中输入。This helps prevent passwords from being exposed to casual observers when they are entered. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性的元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwdchar)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwdchar)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Paste() cil managed

summary.span: 替换中的当前选定与剪贴板的内容。

span.span: Replaces the current selection in the with the contents of the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会清除的内容之前粘贴; 它将当前所选内容将替换为粘贴内容，或在当前光标位置插入粘贴的内容。This method does not clear the contents of the before the paste; it will either replace the current selection with pasted content, or insert the pasted content at the current cursor position. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将内容粘贴到与方法。The following example shows how to paste content into a with the method. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_paste)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_paste)]

summary.span: 获取或设置突出显示选定的文本的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that highlights selected text.

value.span: 突出显示选定的文本的画笔。

span.span: A brush that highlights selected text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定通过设置突出显示选定的文本的画笔和属性。You can specify the brush that highlights selected text by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置属性设置为绿色，属性设置为 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 设置为绿色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox 将 selectionbrush 设置为绿色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") 将 selectionbrush PasswordBox 中选定的文本设置为绿色Selected text in a PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green

summary.span: 获取或设置的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the .
The opacity of the .
The default is 0.4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您设置为 0，是透明的并且不可见。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果您设置为 1.0 或更高，不透明，所选文本不可见。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置属性设置为绿色，属性设置为 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 设置为绿色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox 将 selectionbrush 设置为绿色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") 使用设置为 0.5 的 SelectionOpacity PasswordBox 中选定的文本Selected text in a PasswordBox with SelectionOpacity set to 0.5

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值定义了在 控件中用于所选文本的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that defines the brush used for selected text in the control.
The brush used for selected text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionTextBrushProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly SelectionTextBrushProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`null`，所选的文本不呈现。If this property is `null`, selected text is not rendered.
